title: on me by section 54(2) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024), hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 54(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 54(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2024 (section 54(1)) (commencement) order 2024

title: on me by section 54(2) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024), hereby order
heading: 2. The 1st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which subsection
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which subsection 
(1) of section 54 of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [710] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day march 2025 appointed day subsection (1) section 54 finance act 2024 (no 43 2024) shall come operation given official seal 16 december 2024 jack chamber minister finance notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th december 2024 710 3

title: on me by section 54(2) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024), hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order specifies the date for the purposes of Section 54(1) of Finance Act 
2024 (No.43 of 2024) which provide for the Relief for investment in innovative 
enterprises. The date specified is 1 March 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [710]
